text.__SUMMARY__:
Viola reichenbachiana, the early dog-violet, or pale wood violet is a flowering plant in the violet family Violaceae.
This species hybridises with Viola riviniana, the common dog-violet, to produce Viola × bavarica Schrank 1789.
text.References: Partridge, James (2007) Viola × bavarica: the punctual Dog-violet BSBI News 106:8-9 (illustrated with colour photographs on inside back cover of this edition)
